title: Couple With Heart Man Light Skin Tone Woman Medium Light Skin Tone
alsoKnownAs: Couple with Heart (Man, Light Skin Tone, Woman, Medium-Light Skin Tone)
description: A couple with a heart between them, the man with a light skin tone and the woman with a medium-light skin tone. Represents romantic love, partnership, and affection between two people.
apple_vendor_description: This heartwarming emoji, seen on Apple devices, portrays a couple with a man of light skin tone and a woman of medium-light skin tone, united by a glowing red heart. Apple's characteristic glossy 3D effect makes the heart radiate with warmth and affection, while the figures are rendered with soft rounded edges and realistic lighting. It beautifully symbolizes romantic love, a strong connection, or the formation of a new relationship, bringing a sweet sentiment to digital conversations.
